She decided to join Ruma because she heard that Ruma has the best service and system. Noviantika is a hardworking woman and her community sees her as an informative and kind mobile provider. 

As the business grows, Noviantika needs additional capital and is seeking a working capital loan from Kiva. She will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credits to her community. Noviantika’s goal in the nearl future is to serve an e-commerce business for her community.  As seen in the photo, Noviantika is the one who is standing. She is thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to process more prepaid mobile airtime purchases and utility bill payments (like electricity, water, etc) for members of her local community.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.en:
Sonia is 36 years old active borrower of BRAC Pakistan, residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her spouse and two children. Her husband has been running own tailoring shop in the local market for 4 years, her husband is responsible to fulfill the needs of entire family.

Sonia's husband needs to buy different types of tailoring accessories e.g. pieces of cloth. laces, needles and sewing machine accessories. But due to some financial constraints her husband is not in a suitable condition to buy these items for his business purpose. 

Therefore Sonia has applied for Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan amount she will financially assist her husband to above these tailoring accessories to fulfill his business needs, so that her husband can earn more profitable income.
On this financial assistance Sonia is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: her husband wants to increase his tailoring business to earn a more profitable income

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cocoa beans for selling.

loans.name: Marine

texts.en: Marine is 34 years old and she lives with her family in Kapan city of the Syunik region. Marine is a pedagogue and she works in her specialty at several schools in her city. She is a specialist in English Language and Literature. She is giving paid private courses in English Language and Literature at her house and she helps a group of pupils prepare for their entrance exams. Marine is married and she has two school-aged sons. Her husband is a transport driver. Marine lacks the professional training literature for her courses at her house and she mentions it will be great help for her if Kiva lenders help her with loan which she will use for the purchase of professional literature and also a computer which will also very useful during her courses.

loans.use: purchase professional training literature and also a computer which would be very useful during her courses

loans.name: Hameeda

texts.en:
Hameeda is 48 years old active borrower of BRAC Pakistan, residing in Rawalpindi, Pakistan with her five children. Her son has been running own tailoring shop in the local market for 8 years, her son is responsible to fulfill the needs of entire family.


Hameeda's son needs to buy different types of tailoring accessories e.g. pieces of cloth, laces needles and sewing machine accessories. But due to some financial constraints her son is not in a suitable condition to buy these items for his business purpose. Therefore Hameeda has applied for Kiva loan from its field partner BRAC Pakistan. With the help of this loan amount she will financially assist her son to above these tailoring accessories to fulfill his business needs, so that her son can earn more profitable income.
On this financial assistance Hameeda is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: her husband wanted to increase his tailoring business

loans.name: Antonia Del Carmen

texts.es: Antonia de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos, ella se dedica a la pesca artesanal desde hace mas de 20 años, experiencia que le ha dado la oportunidad de vender una buena calidad de producto por esa razón posee clientes fijos, el está solicitando un crédito ya que necesita comprar las herramientas necesarias para continuar con su trabajo como: trasmallos, redes y darle mantenimiento a la lancha que muestra en la fotografía ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y de ingresos.
texts.en:
Antonia, who is 36 years old, lives in her own house with her husband and their two children. She has been doing traditional fishing for more than 20 years. This experience has given her the opportunity to sell a good quality product. For this reason, she has regular customers. 

She is applying for a loan since she needs to buy the necessary tools to continue with her work, such as nets and trammel nets, and to maintain the boat that is shown in the photograph, since this is her only source of work and income.

loans.use: to buy nets and trammel nets and maintain the boat.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es: Julio de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hija, el se dedica a la pesca artesanal desde hace 20 años de dedicarse a esa actividad de la cual le ha dado la oportunidad de obtener una buena calidad de producto, el está solicitando un crédito ya que necesita comprar las herramientas necesarias para continuar con su trabajo como: trasmallos, redes y darle mantenimiento a la lancha que muestra en la fotografía y así continuar con su trabajo y generar mejores ingresos para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Julio is 33 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and daughter.  He has worked as a traditional fisherman for 20 years, which has given him the opportunity to obtain a good quality product.  He is requesting a loan since he needs to purchase the tools necessary to continue his work like: like trammel nets, hand nets and maintenance for his boat which is shown in the photograph.  This way, he can continue working and generate more income to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase trammel and hand nets and to provide maintenance to his boat.

loans.name: Rosa Elvira

texts.es: Doña rosa de 50 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la  crianza de ganado lechero (producción y venta de leche)  en la zona donde reside tiene más de 30 años de dedicarse a esa actividad ganadera, su esposo le ayuda en la comercialización de la leche por las diferentes colonias que están cerca de su casa, ella esta solicitado un crédito para poder comprar otra vaca y con esto espera obtener resultados favorables y continuar brindando la ayuda económica a su hogar que tanto lo necesita.
texts.en:
Doña Rosa, who is 50 years old, lives in her own house with her husband. She raises dairy cattle (production and sale of milk) in the zone where she lives. She has more than 30 years of experience in this livestock work. Her husband helps her sell the milk in the various towns that are near their house. 

She is applying for a loan in order to be able to buy another cow, and with this she hopes to obtain favorable results and continue offering economic support to her household, which needs it so much.

loans.use: to buy another cow.

loans.name: Zoya

texts.en: Zoya, from Sevan city of the Gegharkunik region, greatly gives thanks for her first Kiva support and hopes for a second profitable Kiva partnership. She still perfectly runs her trading business. She rents a stall at the Sevan wholesale market, where she sells a large variety of products. She sells products that are seasonal as well as those needed for everyday use. In her stall she sells boots, sneakers and rubber shoes along with a large variety of household goods. Last time she asked Kiva for support she had great success in her business. This year she has already planed the assortment of her products that may be great of interest and demand among her customers. She relies on Kiva and Nor Horizon support for the second time. With the coming vacation season it will be good to earn a good profit and this loan of 700.000 Armenian drams is good chance for Zoya to refresh and enlarge the assortment of her stall.

loans.use: to refresh and enlarge the assortment of her stall - clothes and shoes

loans.name: Nazeli

texts.en: Nazeli with her beloved husband lives in Sevan city of the Gegharkunik region. Nazeli never did any other work besides farming. With her husband she established the farm when they were very young and just married couple. Now on her farm she has cows, calves, a bull, heifers and chickens. Nazeli makes very tasty cheese from her farm milk, which she sells to her regular customers from the city. She also sells milk, macun (national dairy-product) meat and eggs. Nazeli’s husband cultivates potatoes and greens on their plot of land. They sell their goods together at the city’s wholesale market. Nazeli says that she wants to increase the number of her cattle and she greatly hopes that Kiva lenders will help her with loan.

loans.use: to increase the number of her cattle

loans.name: Müge

texts.en:
Müge is a young entrepreneur at the age of 23.  She runs a liquor/tobacco store.  After opening her store she had both moral and financial difficulties.  This is her third loan from Maya.  With the help of this loan she purchased goods and increased her profit.  She does not want to have financial problems in the future.


 
Translated from Turkish by Maya staff
Müge Hanım 23 yaşında genç bir girişimci.  Yaşadığı çevrede tekel bayi işletiyor.  İşletmesini açtıktan sonra maddi ve manevi bir çok sıkıntı yaşamış.  Maya’dan üçüncü kredisini kullanan Müge Hanım bu kredileri ile işletmesine mal alarak kar oranını artırdı. Gelecekte maddi sıkıntı yaşamak istemiyor.

loans.use: to buy goods

loans.name: Nazife

texts.en:
Nazife opened her office at the age of 25. She gives consultation to individuals and married couples, and also provides educational services. She invested her Maya loan in her office. She purchased materials that she needed and promoted her office in order to increase her portfolio of clients. Nazife is planning to expand her business, open a bigger center and provide educational services to a wider range of people.

Translated from Turkish by Maya staff

Nazife hanım 25 yaşında açtığı ofisinde kişilere ve evli çiftlere danışmanlık ve eğitim hizmeti veriyor. Maya’dan aldığı kredi ile ofisine yatırım yaptı.  Eksik olan ofis malzemelerini tamamladı.  Kredisini ise ofisinin reklamı için kullandı ve müşteri portföyünü artırdı.  Nazife Hanım gelecekte daha büyük bir merkez açmak ve geniş kitlelere eğitim vermek istiyor.

loans.use: to buy office materials and to promote her business.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es: Doña Maria de 64 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la crianza de ganado bovino y a la elaboración de quesadillas y tamales, tiene más de 50 años de dedicarse a esa actividad de la cual ha podido salir adelante con su esposo, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de materiales para elaborar las quesadillas como harina, azúcar, moldes, entre otras cosas y asi continuar con la elaboración de los alimentos y asi tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Doña Maria, who is 64 years old, lives in her own house with her husband. She raises cattle and makes quesadillas and tamales. She has been working in this business for more than 50 years, and from it she and her husband have been able to get ahead. 

She is applying for a loan for the purchase of materials to make quesadillas, such as flour, sugar, and baking pans, among other items, and to thus continue with the production of the foods and in this way have better economic income.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, and baking pans, among other items.

loans.name: Sos

texts.en: Sos is 49 years old and he lives with his wife in Kapan city of the Syunik region. Sos has two grown children. His son is a student at the Yerevan State Economical Institute and his daughter also works and lives in Yerevan city. His wife works as an accountant. Sos has a higher education in economics and for many years he has worked in his specialty, but he never gave up his beloved agricultural activities. In a nearby village Sos has a very nice vegetable and fruit garden. Here he has apple, apricot and cherry trees and he also gathers from his land a harvest of beans, potatoes, cabbages, carrots and greens. He has divided all his land into two parts, one part he uses for his family and the other part he mainly gives to his friends and relatives. The work with his land is his hobby and he enjoys it very much. This loan Sos will use to repair the fence of his garden and buy young apple trees apple and vegetable seedlings to plant.

loans.use: to repair the fence of his garden and buy young apple trees and vegetable seedlings

loans.name: Mayranush

texts.en:
This will be Mayranush's second Kiva loan and at this time she asks for this loan to pay for her son Vahagn's university tuition. Mayranush hopes that Kiva lenders will again appreciate her ideas and finance her to realize it. 
Mayranush is still involved in her agribusiness. She has many hopes, but the big one is to see her son educated and as a good specialist. 
Mayranush hopes for support.

loans.use: to pay for her son Vahagn's university tuition

loans.name: Micheal

texts.en: Micheal is a 36 year-old man. He is married with six children and lives in Bundibugyo, Uganda. His business is cocoa buying and selling. He also engages in motorcycle transport. He is very hardworking and he started this business to earn income to look after his family. He sells the cocoa to local companies in his area. Micheal hopes to build a permanent house and educate his children. He has requested for loan to rent cocoa gardens to harvest and sell.

loans.use: to rent cocoa gardens to harvest and sell.

loans.name: Anik

texts.en: Anik is 61 years old and she lives with her daughter-in-law and granddaughter in Sevan city of the Gegharkunik region. For several years she worked at the hotel as a cleaner and for several years she also worked as a cook. Now her only occupation is farming. On her farm she has cows, calves, pigs and chickens. With the help of her son’s wife, they sell milk form the farm, macun (national dairy-product), cheese, curd, some meat and eggs. They sell it right from their farm. Anik also cultivates potatoes on her plot of land, which Anik sells to re-sellers. Anik’s son now is in Russian Federation and he also works very hard in order to support his family financially. This loan of 330.000 Armenian drams Anik will use to purchase fodder for her cattle.

loans.use: to buy enough fodder for all her cattle

loans.name: Amelia

texts.pt:
A senhora Amélia, tem 32 anos de idade, solteira e mãe de dois filhos que frequentam o ensino primário. Para além dos seus filhos, sustenta também a sua mãe.
Ela é funcionária de serviços de bombeiro, exerce a função de bombeira e, é estudadnte no ISAP, cursante de Administração Pública.
Com o valor do empréstimo pretende comprar: tubos, fios de eletricidade, tomadas, lâmpadas, interruptores,  cimento, pedra, area para dar a continuidade da sua obra.
A cliente tem como sonho pessoal concluir a sua casa para acomodar os seus filhos e o sonho profissional, gostaria de ser uma jornalista.
Tem como desafio, reembolsar o empréstimo, pese embora, enfrenta dificuldades financeiras
texts.en:
Amélia is 32 years old, single and a mother to two children who go to primary school. As well as her two children she also takes care of her mother. 
Amélia works as a clerical worker for the firefighting service and holds a position as a firefighter. She is a student at ISAP where she is studying Public Administration.

This client's personal dream is to finish working on her home to accommodate her children and her professional dream is to be a journalist. Her challenge is to repay her loan in spite of the financial difficulties she is currently faced with.

loans.use: to buy pipes, electrical wire, shelves, lamps, light switches, cement and stones in the area where she is continuing with her renovations.

loans.name: Hector Eduardo

texts.es: Hector de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hija, el se dedica a la pesca artesanal y al cultivo de maíz, frijol y maicillo, el cliente tiene más de 30 años de dedicarse a esa actividad, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos agrícolas como semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para continuar con sus cultivos y asi poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Hector, who is 45 years old, lives in his own house with his wife and their daughter. He does traditional fishing and raises corn, beans, and sorghum. He has been doing this work for more than 30 years. He sells his products in the surrounding areas of the zone where he lives.

He is applying for a loan to purchase agricultural supplies such as seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, and herbicides and to improve the land that is shown in the photograph in order to continue with his crops and thus be able to have better economic income.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, and herbicides and to improve the land.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: A portion of Stephen's group 200,000 Naira loan will help a member to process and store palm oil products.

loans.name: Nenden

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! Now it’s time for you to meet one of Ruma’s agents, Nenden. Nenden lives in Sukabumi, a city located at the foot of Mount Gede in West Java, about 80 km (50 mi) south of the national capital, Jakarta. She lives there with her husband and her two children. Nenden owns a stall that sells mobile airtime credits and provides bill payment service to her community. Nenden is a friendly and cheerful woman and her community sees her as an informative and kind mobile provider. 

As the business grows, Nenden needs additional capital and is seeking working capital loan from Kiva. She will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credits to her community. Nenden’s goal in the nearl future is to serve as an e-commerce business for her community and selling Ruma’s latest product called Mapan.  As seen in the photo, Nenden is the one who is standing and smiling. She is thankful for your kind and endless support.

loans.use: to process more prepaid mobile airtime purchases and utility bill payments (like electricity, water, etc) for members of her local community.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beer, soda and spirits to sell.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es: Don Gregorio de 68 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo, el se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijol, almacena sus cosechas en los graneros que muestra la fotografía, y luego comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. para poder continuar con su trabajo y tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Don Gregorio, who is 68 years old, lives in his own house with his son. He raises corn and beans. He stores his harvests in the granaries that are shown in the photograph, and then he sells his products in the various markets that are located near his home. With the earnings that he obtains, he manages to pay some of his household expenses.

He is applying for a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, etc., in order to be able to continue with his work and have better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, etc.

loans.name: Ayşe

texts.en:
Ayşe is 62 years old and a mother of two. She is a tailor sewing from home for 45 years. She tailors evening dresses, specifically designed and ordered. She has consistent customers. With the help of the 3rd loan from Maya, she renewed her sewing machine and purchased bulk fabric, thus increasing her profit.

Translated from Turkish by Maya staff

Ayşe Hanım 62 yaşında ve iki çocuk annesi.  45 yıldır evinden terzilik yapıyor.  Özel tasarım ve özel siparişli gece kıyafetleri diken Ayşe Hanımın sürekli müşterileri var.  Maya’dan 3. kredisini kullanan Ayşe Hanım bu kredilerle önce dikiş makinesini yeniledi daha sonra toptan kumaş alarak karını artırdı.

loans.use: to buy fabrics

loans.name: Araba's Group

texts.fr: Araba qui se trouve sur la photo au centre, tenant le drapeau de n'gasene, est membre d’un groupe de 10 agriculteurs inscrits à myAgro, vivant et travaillant dans le village de Boyla 1 au sud-est de Bamako au Mali. Araba, âgée de 44 ans, est la mère de 10 enfants âgés de 10 à 18 ans, dont 7 d’entre eux sont actuellement scolarisés.  L’ancrage de la tradition familiale dans la pratique agricole, source principale de revenu et de l’autosuffisance alimentaire du foyer, mais aussi son mariage avec un agriculteur, ont incité Araba à exercer cette activité depuis maintenant 0 ans. Araba cultive l'arachide, le riz sur sa parcelle mais doit faire face en tant qu’agricultrice à des difficultés telles que le manque de pluie, d'engrais de qualité et d'accès au marché. Araba entame sa première année avec myAgro, et s'est inscrite en raison du système de paiement et des engrais de qualité. Cette année Araba effectue des paiements pour acheter un paquet myAgro de semences OPV et d'engrais pour la culture d'arachide afin d’augmenter ses rendements sur sa parcelle de 0.0625 hectare. Cela fait maintenant 0 ans que Araba cultive l'arachide pour sa valeur commerciale, car l’arachide est un aliment qu’elle vend sur le marché. Araba planifie avec l’augmentation de ses rendements et de son revenu  de pouvoir faire du commerce. Enfin Araba espère aussi pouvoir couvrir les frais scolaires des enfants ainsi qu'assurer l'autosuffisance alimentaire de la famille.
texts.en:
Araba, the one in the center of the photo holding a n'gasene banner, belongs to a group of 10 farmers who have signed up with my Agro. The group members live in work in the village of Boyal 1, to the southeast of Bamako in Mali. Araba is 44 years old and has 10 children ranging from 10 to 18 years of age, 7 of whom are currently in school. Araba's family has been traditionally engaged in farm work, the main source of revenue and food for the household. She also married a farmer and thus has been doing farm work for [number missing] years. Araba grows peanuts and rice on her field. Her challenges are lack of rainfall and quality fertilizers as well as access to the market.

Araba is starting her first year with myAgro. She signed up because of its installment plan to pay for quality fertilizers. This time Araba is making payments for a pack of myAgro OPV [Open Polinated Variety] seeds and fertilizers to increase the yield of peanuts on her field of 0.0625 ha [0.15 acres]. Araba has been growing peanuts for years due to their commercial value as she sells peanuts at the market. With the increase of her yield and her revenues, Araba plans to become a vendor. She also hopes to be able to cover the school fees of her children and ensure that her family has a constant supply of food.

loans.use: to buy a pack of OPV seeds and fertilizers need to grow peanuts.

loans.name: Oscar Adilio

texts.es: Oscar vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijo, el se dedica a la agricultura al cultivo de granos básicos, tiene 10 años de dedicarse a esa actividad, comercializa sus productos agrícolas  en los pueblos aledaños, ya tiene muchos clientes fijos, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía para poder continuar con sus cultivos ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Oscar lives in his own house with his wife and their son. He works in agriculture, raising basic grains. He has been doing this work for 10 years. He sells his agricultural products in the neighboring towns, and he has many regular customers. 

He is applying for a loan for the purchase of seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, herbicides, etc., and to improve the land that is shown in the photograph in order to continue with his crops, since this is his only source of work, and to thus have better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, herbicides, etc., and to improve the land.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 19 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijol, adicional a eso también a la crianza de ganado,  el joven vive en casa propia con sus padres, el está solicitando por tercera vez un crédito para la compra de un ternero para poder continuar con la crianza ya que esa es única fuente de trabajo y así poder tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en: The young man whose face has been pixelated is 19-years old and lives in a high-risk area. He earns his living growing maize and beans as well as raising cattle. He lives in his own house with his parents. He is seeking a loan for the third time to buy a calf so he can continue his cattle-raising business. This is his only source of income, and he hopes to be able to improve his own and his family's standard of living.

loans.use: buy a calf

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 26 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, posee un taller de estructuras metálicas (elabora puertas, balcones, rejas entre otros), tiene 10 años de dedicarse a este negocio el cual inicio con capital propio, ya tiene mucha clientela pues lo buscan por la calidad de su trabajo, el joven vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus tres hijo, el solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar hierro, metal, herramienta etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: The young man whose face has been pixelated is 26-years old and lives in a high-risk area. He owns a workshop where he makes metal objects such as doors, balconies, security bars etc. He has had his business for 10 years and began it with his own capital. He already has many customers who seek him out because of his high-quality work. He lives in his own house with his wife and three children. Now he is seeking a loan to buy iron, other metal, tools etc. so he can earn more money

loans.use: Buy iron, other metal, tools etc.

loans.name: Benigna

texts.pt:
A Senhora Benigna, de 30 anos de idade, casada, mãe de 03 filhos dos quais, dois estudam no ensino primário e um não tem idade escolar. Tem um estabelecimento comercial e um salao de beleza, todavia, com  o valor do empréstimo pretende comprar: refrigerantes, sumos, arroz, açúcar, óleo, sabão e outros produtos básicos para revender.
Tem o sonho de prosperar nos seus negócios e tem como desafio, comprar uma viatura para facilitar nas deslocações das suas compras.
texts.en:
Benigna is 30 years old, married and the mother of three children, two of whom are in primary school while the other one is not yet school aged. She runs a store and a beauty salon. 

With this loan Benigna plans to buy soft drinks, juice, rice, sugar, oil, soap and other basic products to resell. Her dream is to make her businesses prosperous and her challenge is to buy a vehicle to make it easier to transport her purchases.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, juice, rice, sugar, oil, soap and other basic products to resell

loans.name: Bella Luz

texts.es:
Bella es una mujer de 25 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 1 hijo de 5 meses, y su negocio es el horneado de pan tradicional.
Ella es buena madre, independiente, contante, feliz, alegre, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en un mercado de la zona ‘Sur’ de la ciudad, caracterizada por situarse en los bordes del bellísimo curso de agua, paseo tradicional del fin de semana, edificaciones rústicas con materiales regionales en donde se puede comer comida tradicional y efectuar algunas actividades deportivas, de clima sub tropical con una temperatura que varía de 21-35 grados centígrados durante todo el año. 
Bella es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro largo lo usa amarrado por detrás, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, viste a la moda, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que trabaja como chófer y  con su bebé que es lactante, viven en un cuarto alquilado construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y piso de cerámica que cuenta con los servicios de agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la elaboración y venta de pan de la variedades de; pan de arroz ( a base de harina de arroz), pan de maíz ( a base de maíz), pan de leche (a base de leche), Empanada de jigote (Masa delgada de harina de trigo rellena con mezcla de carne o pollo y verduras), Bizcochos de trigo (Bollitos duros de harina de trigo) y otros. Actividad que realiza en un cuarto de su casa habilitado como panadería, para realizar la venta de forma ambulante a diferentes tiendas y puestos de venta, “inicié mi negocio desde este mismo lugar, con la ayuda de mi pareja los repartimos y cuidamos a nuestro bebé…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con clientes diarios, la desventaja es la falta de harina para hornear mayor cantidad y llegar a más clientes. Su sueño es tener una panadería grande y vender por mayor, ella desea realizar la compra de diferentes tipos de harina por quintal. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 3 años que viene realizando esta actividad. 
Es por esos motivos que Bella solicita un préstamo para la compra de variedades de harinas por quintal para hornear diferentes tipos de pan y llegar a más clientes.
texts.en: Bella is a 25 year old woman who lives with husband and has one son who is 5 months old.  Her business is baking traditional bread.  She is a good mother, independent, content, happy, joyful, responsible and very hard-working.  She operates her business in a market in the Southern zone of the city, characterized by its location on the banks of a beautiful waterway, its traditional walks on the weekends, its rustic buildings with regional materials where you can eat traditional food and play some sports, and its subtropical climate with temperatures ranging from 21-35 degrees Celsius during the whole year.  Bella has a dark complexion and brown eyes, with long, black hair that she wears tied back.  She is short and thin in stature, and fashionably dressed.  Her native language is Guaraní which she speaks with her family and she speaks Spanish because of the general culture and the business she operates.  She shares her life with her husband who works as a chauffeur and with her baby who is nursing.  They live in a rented room made of bricks and cement with a corrugated tin roof and a ceramic tile floor that has services like running water, electricity, and sewage.  Her business is preparing and selling a variety of breads: rice bread (rice flour base), corn bread (corn flour base), milk bread (milk base), meat empanadas (thin dough filled with beef or chicken and vegetables), wheat bizcochos (hard balls of wheat flour) and others.  She operates her business in a room of her home that is set up as a bakery, and sells her bread on foot to different stores and places of business.  "I started my business in this place, and with the help of my husband, we divide responsibilities and take care of our baby," she comments.  The advantage of her business is that she interacts daily with customers and the disadvantage is the lack of flour so that she can bake in greater quantities and attract more customers.  Her dream is to have a large bakery and sell wholesale.  She wants to purchase different types of flour in bulk.  This is the first in a sequence of loans with this organization in the three years that she has been running this business.  It is for these reasons that Bella is requesting a loan to purchase a variety of flours in bulk to bake different types of bread and reach more customers.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of flour in bulk to bake different types of bread and attract more customers.

loans.name: Estela

texts.pt:
A senhora Estrela, tem 49 anos de idade, solteira e mãe de cinco filhos dos quais dois é que estão na sua responsabilidade e os restantes três estão nos seus lares.
Ela trabalha como doméstica numa e, com o valor do empréstimo pretende comprar: varroes, pregos,  cimento, pedra, areia para dar a continuidade da sua obra.
A cliente tem como sonho construir a sua loja para garantir a sua reforma e concluir a sua casa.
Tem como desafio, reembolsar o empréstimo, pese embora, enfrenta dificuldades financeiras
texts.en:
Estrela is 49 years old, single and a mother to five children of whom two are under her care and the rest all live in their own homes. 

Estrela works as a housekeeper and with the money from this loan she will buy rods, nails, cement, stones and sand to continue with her home renovations.

This client's dream is to build a store as a guarantee for her renovations and to finish working on her house. Her challenge is to repay her loan in spite of the financial difficulties she is faced with.

loans.use: to buy rods, nails, cement, stones and sand to continue with her home renovations

loans.name: Ana

texts.pt:
Ana é solteira de 1 filho menor de idade vive na casa própria e tem duas pessoas na sua responsabilidade que são sobrinhos, vive atraves de negócio, tem uma mercearia na zona da marinha onde dia adia acorda para garantir o pão da sua família e da sua sobrevivença.
Com o dinheiro do emprestimo vai comprar ferro, cimento e pagar a mão- de- obra aos pedreiros.
O seu maior sonho é concluir a sua casa para viver com o seu filho, pagar escola para o seu filho,espandir o seu negócio para outras zonas da provincia e construir casas para aluger.que servirão da sua reforma.
Os principais desafio é formar o seu e melhorar as condições de habitação
texts.en:
Ana is single and the mother of one young son. She lives in her own home and has two people under her care who are her nephews. She lives behind her grocery store which is located by the sea. Day after day she gets up to make sure her family have bread to eat and to ensure their survival.

Ana's greatest dream is to finish her house so she can live there with her son, pay for his schooling, expand her business into other areas of the province and build houses to rent out in her retirement. Her main challenge is educate her son and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy iron and cement and pay the masons for their labour

loans.name: Erisama

texts.en: Erisama, who operates a retail shop of general merchandise, is a married man with one child living in Hoima, Uganda. He also earns a monthly salary from the government as a medical officer. His business dream is expanding his business to also trade in wholesale goods though he is affected by the high cost of rent. He intends to use the loan facility to buy general merchandise such as washing soap, tooth paste, biscuits, etc. to sell.

loans.use: to buy general merchandise such as washing soap, tooth paste, biscuits, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Godfrey Samuel

texts.en: Godfrey is a 51-year-old married male who lives in the town of Masindi, Uganda. He is a hardworking man who has lodges for generating income. He earns a monthly salary from the government to boost his income. He started the business to support his family. He faces a challenge of getting seasonal customers and high license fees . Godfrey intends to use the loan to renovate his lodges.

loans.use: to renovate his lodges.

loans.name: Juana Francisca

texts.es: Doña Juana de 64 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres nietos y su tío, ella se dedica a la venta de productos de uso personal desde hace 14 años, su negocio está ubicado en su lugar de residencia, con las ventas que realiza es como logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de perfumes, lociones, cremas, shampoo, desodorantes etc. todo por mayor y así poder seguir con su trabajo para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Juana is 64 years old and lives in her own home with her three grandchildren and her uncle. She has made a living selling personal products for 14 years. Her business is located in her residence. With the sales that she makes, she is able to settle some household expenses. She is asking for a loan to buy perfumes, lotions, creams, shampoo, deodorants, etc., all at wholesale and this way she can continue with her job to get a better income.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, lotions, creams, shampoo, deodorant, etc., all wholesale.

loans.name: Joaquim

texts.pt:
O Joaquim solteiro com 4 filhos todos menores de idade, dois com idade escolar,vive na casa                 propria e tem mais uma pessoa na sua responsabilidade é trabalhador numa uma empresa de transporte  publico.  Não só depende do emprego mas também dos outros serviços extras como  pedreiro.
Com o dinheiro do emprestimo vai comprar cimento, chapas de zinco,barrotes e portas.
O seu maior sonho é terminar a sua casa, pagar escola para os seu filhos ,progredir na careira profissional .
Os prnicipais desafios: pagar escola para os seus filhos continuar a estudar e ter um bom emprego,terminar a sua casa ,progredir de carreira profissional.
texts.en:
Joaquim is single and has four young children, two of whom go to school. He lives in his own home and has one other person under his care. He works for a public transport company. He does not depend on this job as he also offers other extra services as a builder.  

With the money from this loan Joaquim will buy cement, zinc plates, beams and doors. His greatest dream is to finish his house, pay for his children's schooling and advance to a professional career. His main challenges are paying the school fees for his children so they can continue studying, getting a good job, finishing his house and developing a professional career.

loans.use: to buy cement, zinc plates, beams and doors

loans.name: Laura

texts.pt:
Laura, solteira mãede uma filha maior de idade, vive na casa propria tem mais uma pessoa na sua responsabilidade e vive na baes de negocio tendo uma mercearia.
Com o dinheiro do emprestimo vai comprar arroz, oleo alimentar, açúcar cerveja e refrescos.
O seu sonho é melhorar as condiçoes de habitaçao, pagar escola para a sua filha e pagar, ampliar a sua mercearia e espandir os seus nogócios. O principal desafio é pagar curso para a sua filha, gerir melhor o seu negócio para melhorar a renda familiar.
texts.en:
Laura is single and has an adult daughter. She lives in a house that she owns and she's responsible for another person. She owns a grocery shop and earns a livelihood through her business.
With the money from the loan she'll purchase rice, cooking oil, sugar, beer, and refreshments.
Her dream is to improve her living conditions, provide education for her daughter, enlarge her grocery store and expand her business. Her biggest challenge is paying for her daughter's classes and better managing her business in order to improve her family's income.

loans.use: to purchase rice, cooking oil, sugar, beer, and refreshments.

loans.name: Isaias

texts.pt:
O baltazar é solteiro  pai de dois filhos menores de idade, vive na casa própria junto com os seus pais e seus irmaos.é trabalhador de uma padaria na katembe.
Com o valor de emprestimo vai comprar cimento e barrotes para dar continuidade a sua obra.
O seu maior sonho é ter uma casa própria, contrair matrimonio,e assumir um cargo de encaregado na sua empresa. 
É progredir na carreira  profissional.
texts.en:
Baltazar is single and the father of two young children. He lives in his own home together with his parents and his siblings. He works in a bakery in Katembe.

With the money from this loan he will buy cement and beams to continue his renovations. His greatest dream is to have his own home, marry, take on a managerial role in his company and advance in a professional career.

loans.use: to buy cement and beams to continue his renovations

loans.name: Cacilda

texts.pt:
A Cacilda é solteira mãe de 2 filhos, todos menores de idade mas com idade escolar, não tem mais ninguem  na sua responsabilidade. vive na casa própria em construção e é balconista na mercearia do irmão,para além de ser trabalhadora faz tambem negócios. Para seu sustento conta tambem com a renda do imóvel.
Com o dinheiro do emprestimo vai comprar cimento, chapas de zinco, portas e aros das janelas.
O seu sonho e esperança é terminar a sua casa, pagar escola para a sua familia, expandir os seus negócios e ter um melhor emprego.
O seu desafio é pagar escola dos seus filhos ter uma mercearia, construir mais casas para arrendar.
texts.en:
Cacilda is single and has two children who are underage but already in school. She doesn't have anyone else under her care. She lives in a a house that she owns and it is under construction. She's a clerk at her brother's grocery store. Aside from being in the workforce, she's also an entrepreneur. In addition, she rents out a house as a means of livelihood.
With the money from the loan she'll purchase cement, zinc plates, doors and window frames.
Her hopes and dreams are to finish her house, pay for her family's education, expand her business and find a better job.
Her challenge is paying for her children's schooling, having her own grocery store, and building more houses to rent out.

loans.use: to purchase cement, zinc plates, doors and window frames.

loans.name: Inn Ga Lone Village Group-1

texts.en:
This loan will help 29 members of the Inn Ga Lone Village Group-1. Pictured above (from left to right) are Htay, San, Yin and Kyin. The Featured Borrower, Htay, has a 23 acre paddy farm in the Delta region of Myanmar, and like many farmers in this area, savings are low before the harvest season. 

Htay is a hardworking woman who has spent the last eight years paddy farming. This loan will help her purchase the necessary farming inputs, such as fertilizer and petrol for farm equipment. 

Htay is 58 years old, married, and supports a family of seven (five children). In the near future, she wishes to grow her income by diversifying her business by planting betel trees. She  hopes this will allow her to support her three children's education, who are attending 5th grade, 9th grade and Educational College.

The CBO leaders oversee the group of 29. The loan will help the group purchase farming essentials before harvest time. Inn Ga lone Village’s main focus is crop farming, as well as other seasonal plantation such as betel trees and flowers, for additional income.

loans.use: to rent farm equipment and buy crop seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es:
Santiago es un hombre de 49 años de edad, soltero, tiene 2 hijos de 16 y 18 años, y su negocio es el comercio de bolsas sintéticas.
Él es buen padre, emprendedor, independiente, constante, responsable y muy trabajador. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona ‘Ceja’ es una de las zonas más importantes de la ciudad, congrega la mayoría de los edificios administrativos, comerciales y sedes de organizaciones sociales. En este lugar cada quien tiene algo que ofrecer, sean tornillos, chocolates o cualquier tipo de comida. En kilómetros de puestos de venta se puede encontrar desde un pistón de auto de segunda mano hasta un polvo mágico para curar el mal de ojo.
Santiago es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro corto, baja estatura, complexión física delgada, su lengua materna es el Aymará que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por las actividades que realiza. Su vida la realiza en compañía de sus hijos que estudian en la escuela, viven en una casa propiedad de la familia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y piso de madera que cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica, gas domiciliario y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la venta de bolsas, actividad que realiza todos los días de la semana en horas del día. Él se ocupa de visitar tienda de barrio, de ropa, todo tipo de comercio para entregar y vender las bolsas, estas bolsas se utilizan para transportar o guardar todo tipo de material, “inicié mi negocio con un capital mínimo, fui variando la mercadería, tengo clientes que me piden todo tipo de bolsas…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que su mercadería se utiliza casi para todo, la desventaja es la falta de dinero para la compra de mercadería por mayor. Su sueño es abrir una tienda distribuidora de envases plásticos, el desea realizar la compra de bolsas sintéticas por mayor. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamo con la institución en 20 años que desarrolla esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Santiago solicita un préstamo para la compra de bolsas sintéticas y envases plásticos para abrir una tienda distribuidora.
texts.en:
Santiago is a 49 year old man. He is single and has 2 children who are 16 and 18 years old. His business is selling synthetic bags. He is a good father, enterprising, independent, reliable, responsible, and very hard-working. His business is carried out in the "Ceja" area. It is one of the most important areas of the city. It holds the majority of the administrative and commercial buildings, and social organization offices. In this place everyone has something to offer, whether it's screws, chocolates or any type of food. Throughout kilometers of stalls, one can find anything from a second-hand car piston to a magical dust that cures the evil eye. 

Santiago is dark-skinned, with brown eyes, short black hair, short stature, and a thin physique. His native language is Aymará which he speaks with family and he speaks Spanish in every day life and for his business. He lives his life in the company of his children who are in school. They live in a house owned by the family. It is made of brick and cement with a tin roof and wood floors, and has drinking water, electricity, gas and sewerage. 

His business is selling bags, which he works every day of the week during the day. He works through visiting neighborhood shops, clothing stores, all types of businesses, to deliver and sell the bags. These bags are used to transport or protect all types of materials. "I began my business with a minimum amount of money. I was changing the products. I have clients that ask me for all types of bags..." he says. 

The advantage of his business is that his products can be used for almost anything. The disadvantage is the lack of money to buy the products at wholesale price. His dream is to open a retail store for plastic containers. He wants to achieve buying the synthetic bags at wholesale. This is the 1st sequence of loans with the institution in 20 years that he has been doing this job. It is for these reasons that Santiago is asking for a loan to buy synthetic bags and plastic containers to open a retail store.

loans.use: to buy synthetic bags and plastic containers to open a retail store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in galvanized steel, wood, nails and wire to change the roof on her house.

loans.name: Ferrinho

texts.pt:
Ferrinho é militar, solteiro pai de 3 filhos todos menores de idade, tem 2 irmãos na sua responsabilidade e vive na casa de aluguer. 
Com o dinheiro do empréstimo  vai legalizar o espaço para construir uma casa própria.
O seu sonho é ter uma casa pessoal, terminar escola, pagar escola dos seus filhos,progredir de profissão para melhorar o seu salario.
Tem como desafio construir uma casa, terminar escola para progredir de profissão e melhorar as condições da sua familia
texts.en:
Ferrinho is in the military. He is a single father of three young children, has two siblings under his care and lives in a rented home.

With the money from this loan Ferrinho plans to buy some land to build his own home. His dream is to have his own home, finish school, pay for his children's education and advance in his profession to improve his salary. His challenge is to build a home, finish school to advance in his profession and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy land to build a home

loans.name: Leonor

texts.pt:
Senhora Leonor tem 46 anos de idade, casada e mãe de cinco filhos dos quais 4 estudam frequentando ensino primário e secundário, trabalha como cozinheira na casa de um singular, vive em casa própria com a sua família.
O montante financiado será aplicado para a compra de cimento, chapas, barrotes, para dar continuidade a construção da sua casa.
No futuro pretende adquirir um terreno para construir casa para os filhos e melhorar as condições da que reside actualemte.
O seu maior desafio é garantir sustento escolar dos filhos ate fazerem a licenciatura e liquidar o empréstimo sem entrar em mora
texts.en:
Leonor is 46 years old and married. She has five children, four of whom are in primary and secondary school. She works as a cook in a private home and lives with her family in a house that she owns.
The amount of the loan will be used to purchase cement, metal plates, and beams so that she can continue building her house.
In the future she intends to acquire a plot of land in order to build a house for her children and improve the conditions of her current home.
Her biggest challenge is paying for her children's education until they finish college. Another challenge is repaying the loan without delinquency.

loans.use: to purchase cement, metal plates and beams so that she can continue building her house.

loans.name: Briceida Del Socorro

texts.es:
Briceida es una mujer pujante, servicial y trabajadora, a sus 61 años de edad, es casada y madre de 2 hijos a los que ha sacado adelante con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación.

Desde hace 4 años se desempeña en el campo de la confección, prestando el servicio de confección a terceros y a clientes directos, el oficio lo aprendió a través de las enseñanzas de una vecina, así genera los recursos suficientes para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar.

Actualmente se motiva a solicitar el crédito para comprar una máquina de coser Industrial y herrajes, esto le permitirá tener mejor producción para cumplir con la entrega oportuna de los pedidos que tiene pendientes, logrando fidelizar a sus clientes actuales.

Briceida manifiesta que desea continuar realizando su labor con mucho empeño, pues quiere ampliar su negocio y poder generar oportunidades de empleo, además de garantizar una estabilidad económica para dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Briceida is a strong woman who is helpful and hard-working.  At 61 years old, she is married and the mother of 2 children.  She has dedicated her efforts to giving them a good education.  

She has made a living as a dressmaker for 4 years, providing her sewing services to third parties and direct clients.  She learned this trade from a neighbor, and it allows her to generate enough income to support her husband in paying household expenses.  

Currently, she is applying for a loan to buy an industrial sewing machine and iron fittings in order to improve production to fill pending orders, allowing her to gain customer loyalty from her current clients.  

Briceida declares that she wants to continue doing her job with great care, since she wants to expand her business and be able to generate employment opportunities for others, as well as guarantee her family economic stability for a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy an industrial sewing machine and iron fittings in order to improve production

loans.name: Venancio

texts.pt:
Senhor Venâncio, tem 27 anos de idade, casado e pai de 4 filhos sem idade escolar, trabalha como auxiliar de produção numa empresa de processamento de cereais, vive em casa própria com a sua família e sustenta sua mãe.
O montante financiado será aplicado para a compra de varões, cimento, areia, para dar continuidade a construção da sua casa, visto que mora na mesma mas ainda está em construção.
No futuro pretende terminar a construção da sua casa e colocar mobília de modo a garantir conforto e dignidade para a sua família.
O seu maior desafio é de liquidar o empréstimo sem entrar em mora como forma de garantir futuros financiamentos e consequentemente lograr os seus projectos de forma célere.
texts.en:
Venâncio is 27 years old and married. He has four children who are below school age. He works as a laborer for a grain processing company. He lives with his family in a house that he owns, and he also supports his mother.
The amount of the loan will be used to purchase rods, cement, and sand so that he can continue building his house. He already lives there but the house is still undergoing construction.
In the future he intends to finish building and furnishing his house as a way of providing decent and comfortable living for his family.
His biggest challenge is repaying the loan without delinquency. That way he'll guarantee future loans and therefore accomplish his projects within a shorter amount of time.

loans.use: to purchase rods, cement and sand so that he can continue building his house.

loans.name: William

texts.en: William is a hardworking man who does farming and runs a retail shop to generate more income. He is married with one child, living in Masindi, Uganda. His greatest desires are to educate his children and sustain his family. He is challenged by fire outbreaks, pests and diseases that affect his expected returns. William intends to use the loan facility to plough his garden and buy fertilizers.

loans.use: to plough his garden and buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Inn Ga Lone Village Group-2

texts.en:
The funds will help 30 members of the Inn Ga Lone Village Group-2. Pictured above are the CBO leaders, named (from left to right) Khin, Nin, Moe, Hla and Zaw. The Featured Borrower, Khin, has a 10-acre farm in the Delta region of Myanmar. Khin is 43 years old, married, and supports a family of four (two children), the youngest of whom is in eighth grade. Like many farmers in this area, savings are low before the harvest season. The loan will help her purchase the necessary farming resources such as fertilizer. In the near future, she is planning to open a farming equipment shop from profits generated from the crop farming. She hopes that this hard work will pay off for her son’s education.

The CBO leaders oversee a group of 30 borrowers in the village. The funds will help the group purchase farming essentials before harvest time. Inn Ga Lone Village’s main focus is crop farming, as well as other seasonal plantations such as betel trees and flowers, for additional income.

loans.use: to rent farm equipment and purchase crop seeds and petrol for farm equipment.

loans.name: Bendicto

texts.en:
Bendicto grows beans and maize on a large scale for both sales and home consumption. He is a 56-year-old married man living in Masindi, Uganda. He has hopes of educating his children and expanding his farm to yield more output. Price fluctuation is still a challenge as well as weather vagaries that lead to low yields.

Bendicto has requested a loan to weed his garden.

loans.use: to weed his garden.

loans.name: Robina

texts.en: Robina, 49 years old, is a very enthusiastic person who has been successfully running a small general store along with her husband (also shown in the photo). She offers a variety of daily use products and has a good client base. In order to avoid shortages, Robina needs to have various goods in stock to efficiently meet customer demand. She has requested a loan of PKR 45,000 to buy additional grocery items including oil, milk, sugar, juices, etc. to consistently meet the increasing demand at her store and make better earnings.

loans.use: to buy additional grocery items including oil, milk, sugar, juices, etc. to consistently meet the increasing demand at her store and make better earnings.
